text: I am glad to be able to share feedback, but I had several issues that left me frustrated. The account billing appeared incorrect on my latest statement, which caused confusion and extra follow-up. The outage events were poorly communicated, so I found myself waiting for an update that never arrived. The support team eventually clarified some details, but the resolution left me unsatisfied. Overall, this experience was not what I expected, and I am concerned about future bills.

incidents.comment: AI_summary: Customer reports incorrect billing and outage communication issues leading to frustration and follow-up.
AI_recommendation: Investigate and correct any billing discrepancies on the account; implement enhanced outage notification and proactive follow-ups to improve clarity on future outages.

text: I appreciate the opportunity to provide feedback. The service experience was adequate, not outstanding, but steady throughout the process. The billing was clear, and the statements arrived on time without surprises. The app and online portal functioned reliably most of the time, though I did encounter a minor glitch once. I would be comfortable with using the service again, though I would not consider it exceptional.

incidents.comment: AI_summary: Customer describes adequate, steady service with clear billing and a minor app glitch; neutral overall impression.
AI_recommendation: Monitor app stability; address the minor glitch promptly; maintain clear billing and reliable portal performance.

text: I am extremely satisfied with the service overall. From the moment I contacted support to the final invoice, everything was smooth and efficient. The billing was transparent, and the charges matched the plan I subscribed to without surprises. The outage issues we faced earlier were resolved quickly, and the portal updates were timely, which built trust. The pricing options available matched my needs, and the mobile app worked flawlessly for checking usage. I would definitely recommend Synergy WA based on this experience.

incidents.comment: AI_summary: Customer reports high satisfaction across billing, outage resolution, portal updates, pricing options, and mobile app performance; support experience was smooth.

AI_recommendation: Share best practices from this account with support teams; ensure pricing options continue to align with customer needs; reinforce app reliability and timely outage/resolution communications.

text: From start to finish, the agent listened carefully and asked clarifying questions when needed. They explained the options clearly and walked me through the next steps. I never felt rushed and appreciated the respectful tone. The information provided was thorough and easy to understand, even for someone not technically savvy. The resolution to my issue was smooth, and I was left with a positive impression of the service. The follow-up was timely and appreciated.

The initial contact seemed okay, but I encountered several issues from start to finish. I felt the agent didn't fully listen to my concerns, and I had to repeat details. The information provided was inconsistent, which increased my frustration. The process felt slow and not well organized. Overall, this experience was disappointing and I would not say it exceeded my expectations.
